projects.title: My Portfolio V3
projects.details: My personal portfolio page. My current personal magnum opus. I've come a long way from my V1 and V2 versions and along with my designer Ahmed Bash i brought this lovely website to life.

projects.title: Multistep form
projects.details: Had some fun with this one and took advantage of Framer-motions's layout prop to make the step indicators' animation responsive.

projects.title: Rest Countries Browser
projects.details: Bit of a doozy implementing this. I tried to step as far out of my comfort zone as possible and shipped a bare bones (by my standards) responsive frontend app.

projects.title: Fullstack Invoice App
projects.details: Fun project that i decided to use to familiarize myself with Next JS 13 and all it's cool features.

projects.title: Dictionary App
projects.details: Honestly this one was pretty straight-forward. Setting up the theme provider taught me a lot, and its one of the better designed responsive apps as well. Kudos the FM Team.

projects.title: News Homepage
projects.details: Had a lot of fun with the page loader, tried it first on my portfolio site amd it honestly works so well it makes me giddy.

projects.title: Tip calculator app
projects.details: A frontend mentor challenge, this small app is perfect for anyone starting to get to grips with JavaScript. The calculator functionality will be a nice test!

projects.title: Netsuite Financial Connectivity Application
projects.details: In my time as a technical consultant i built a connectivity app that was to allow banks across Nigeria synchronize their bank statements with Netsuite's accounting interface by leveraging Okra, and SFTP
